attributes.action: Close our borders & create a points system for entry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To call a halt to immigrants flooding the country & to create a points system (i.e New Zealand/Australia)that fills job shortages. This inturn could also stop the "Brain Drain" of educated British people fleeing the country in the need to escape this over crowded island.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
